content: side turn all sizes right side heel row rs slip first stitch work the ribbing as it appears until one stitch before the gap between heel and gusset ssk last heel stitch aka gusset border stitch with next gusset stitch turn all sizes wrong side heel row ws slip first stitch work the ribbing as it appears until one stitch before the gap between the heel and gusset p2tog last heel stitch aka gusset border stitch with next gusset stitch turn continue alternating right and wrong side row until one last increased stitch of the gusset remains 14 15 16 decreases on each side instead of turning and working back across the sole ssk the last increased stitch with the heel edge as before then knit the instep gusset border stitch followed by the instep as the stitches present on the other side of the instep knit the instep gusset border stitch k2tog the remaining gusset stitch with the heel side gusset border stitch and work ribbing across the heel as set remove and set aside the optional gusset markers as needed when you reach the 2 gusset border stitches work a 1x1 cable crossing with the instep side stitch crossing over the heel stitch replace the bor marker between these 2 stitches work the instep as it appears cross the other 2 gusset border stitches instep over heel moving the mor marker to between the two stitches and work across to bor as the stitches appear leg chart change to a larger needle if needed work the leg chart on both front and back of leg repeat the 20 rounds 3 times or to desired length making sure to stop with a 2x2 rib pattern and noting the last round worked ribbing work 10 rounds of ribbing work 2 rounds of plain knitting marking the stitch before mor on the second round with a removable stitch marker you need this later to separate the socks conjoined sock twins v6 0 ©2025 katherine richmond rinaradish 6 of 12 now begin working the top down sock work 1 more round of plain knitting ribbing work 11 rounds of ribbing as set before the separation rounds yes there is an extra round here but that is needed so the cables appear the same distance from the cuff leg chart turn the leg chart upside down or work from the top down if the chart is turned upside down work from left to right work chart 3 times if a different number of row was worked on the toe up sock start with the last row worked on the way up this time the cables will move toward the center front and center back of the leg note always work the back stitches of the cables as the stitches need to be for the next round if you changed to larger needles for the leg switch back at the start of the heel flap heel flap this time the flap is worked like
